name: ndla-ui
description: Styleguide and ui component library for NDLA.

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib && cpx './src/**/*.css' ./lib
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es && cpx './src/**/*.css' ./es
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build

author: ndla@knowit.no
